1123321.content:
Eliot was born into a very rich family and was very spoled, she got any thing she wanted cloths, jewelry, and money but none of those things made her as happy as food! Despite her mothers nagging about never getting fat, she was always eating! Her favorite food was, well she didn't have a favorite kind of food she loved to eat out of any food group even fruits and vegetables, which is normally healthy except when you eat them in excess which she did regularly! Even when she was in school she was eating, she was even served a extra large lunch, that her father had to pay a lot of money for the school to alow those things, and because of her constant gorging by the time she got a job at a hospital called sacred heart, she weighed 985 pounds, it was at this job where she met J.D and after more then eight years of on again off again dating they got engaged and on their wedding day she weighed 2,955 pounds, and now with the combined money she was receiving from her dad, her job and J.D she was now growing fatter and faster then ever before!

Now when dose the story start?

114332221.content:
“Ugh, how’m I doin’, J.D.?” Elliot asked as she rubbed tightly stuffed gut in an attempt to soothe it.

She had pack her stomach with so much food that all her fat rolls had been ironed out into on flabby bulge. And it was a big bulge, just sitting down, her stomach had grown so large that it was almost touching the floor!

“Well, you’re defiantly past seven hundred pounds by now.” J.D. replied calmly.

Elliot arched an eyebrow. “Y’know, most guys who get to see their fantasies fulfilled right in front of them are a little more excited. Yet you’re acting really tame, especially for you seeing as you’re normally all about fantasy.”

“Oh, I’m excited alright, I just don’t want Little J.D. to get as excited in public. If you catch my drift…”

“Ah, I get ya, well then, how about I skip dessert so when can go home and relieve some of that excitement?”

It didn’t even take a full second for J.D. to be up out of his own seat and next to Elliot. “Oh goody!” He said in excitement.

“My friends are right; you are the girl in our relationship.” Elliot allowed herself to laugh a bit at her own joke before she tried to get up from her seat. Emphasis on tried. Elliot had grown so big and so logic defyingly fast, that she didn’t have the strength to lift herself. After struggling against her girth for a full minute, she had become to tiered to continue. “Uh, J.D., can I get a little help?” She asked, holing her flabby arms out for J.D. to grab, which was exhausting in itself because of how heavy they had become.

Eager to return home, J.D. grabbed her arms and be began to pull hard, but he was never known for his upper body strength…or any strength whatsoever.
